com.complexible.common.memory

Interface ObjectSerializer<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ExtendedObjectSerializer<T>, FixedSizeObjectSerializer<T>

    public interface ObjectSerializer<T>

    A serializer which can round-trip POJOs to bytes for storage off heap or on disk. This serializer does not assume knowledge about size of objects and can serialize objects of variable size.

    Since:
    2.1
    Version:
    4.1
    Author:
    Michael Grove, Pavel Klinov
    See Also:
    FixedSizeObjectSerializer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T read(LongByteBuffer theBuf)
      Read an object from the provided buffer
      default boolean supportsNull()
      Indicates whether or not this object can serialize/deserialize null values
      void write(T theObj, LongByteBuffer theBuf)
      Write the provided object to the buffer

    • Method Detail

      • supportsNull

        default boolean supportsNull()
        Indicates whether or not this object can serialize/deserialize null values
        Returns:
        true if nulls can be serialized, false otherwise

      • read

        T read(LongByteBuffer theBuf)
        Read an object from the provided buffer
        Parameters:
        theBuf - the buffer
        Returns:
        the object

      • write

        void write(T theObj,
           LongByteBuffer theBuf)
        Write the provided object to the buffer
        Parameters:
        theObj - the object to write
        theBuf - the buffer to write to
